Name: Shipment Status Code
Notes: Code indicating the status of a shipment
Remarks:
E0103: Only one of AT7-01 or AT7-03 may be present
P0102: If either AT7-01 or AT7-02 is present, then the other is required
If AT701 is present, AT705 is the date the status occurred. If AT703 is present, AT705 is a date related to an appointment.
If AT701 is present, AT706 is the time of the status. If AT703 is present, AT706 is the time of the appointment.

Name: Shipment Status or Appointment Reason Code
Notes: Code indicating the reason a shipment status or appointment reason was transmitted

Name: Shipment Appointment Status Code
Notes: Code indicating the status of an appointment to pick-up or deliver a shipment
Remarks: P0304: If either AT7-03 or AT7-04 is present, then the other is required

Name: Shipment Status or Appointment Reason Code
Notes: Code indicating the reason a shipment status or appointment reason was transmitted

Name: Time
Notes: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)
Remarks: C0605: If AT7-06 is present, then AT7-05 is required

Name: Time Code
Notes: Code identifying the time. In accordance with International Standards Organization standard 8601, time can be specified by a + or - and an indication in hours in relation to Universal Time Coordinate (UTC) time; since + is a restricted character, + and - are substituted by P and M in the codes that follow
Remarks:
C0706: If AT7-07 is present, then AT7-06 is required
If AT707 is not present then AT706 represents local time of the status.
